entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:47PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Hot Temperatures Expected This Weekend... Widespread temperatures in the 80s are expected across the Interior this weekend. Highs will be in the mid 80s on Saturday, while Sunday looks to be warmer, with many locations, including Fairbanks, seeing highs in the upper 80s. Make sure to visit weather.gov/fairbanks for the latest forecast
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Interior; Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:43PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Albany County through 215 PM MDT... At 142 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Wheatland Reservoir 3 to 6 miles southeast of Rock River. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:38PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hot Springs and southeastern Park Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 137 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Washakie Needles, which is also 23 miles southwest of Meeteetse, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Cody Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southwest Big Horn Basin
